Geometry.r_sofa : (Geometry.default))))
textures: query.is_name_any('Notebook', 'notebook') ? Texture.notebook : query.is_name_any('Stove', 'stove') ? Texture.stove : query.is_name_any('Sofa', 'sofa') ? Texture.sofa : (query.is_name_any('M_sofa', 'm_sofa') ? Texture.m_sofa : (query.is_name_any('L_sofa', 'l_sofa') ? Texture.l_sofa : (query.is_name_any('R_sofa', 'r_sofa') ? Texture.r_sofa : (Texture.default))))
